keyMoments.description: Luffy continues his battle against Gecko Moria, one of the Seven Warlords of the Sea.
keyMoments.significance: Ongoing confrontation between the Straw Hats and the Thriller Bark Pirates.

keyMoments.description: Usopp faces off against Perona in a critical battle, using intelligence and observation to overcome her overwhelming powers.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the crew's strategic abilities and determination to defeat Moria's forces.

keyMoments.description: Usopp (as Sogeking) successfully purifies Kumashi, eliminating one of Perona's strongest allies.
keyMoments.significance: Major victory for the Straw Hats in weakening the enemy forces.

name.japanese: スリラーバーク海賊団

keyMoments.description: Gecko Moria battles Luffy using his shadow manipulation powers.
keyMoments.significance: The captain of Thriller Bark Pirates fights to defend his territory.

keyMoments.description: Perona engages Usopp using her Horo Horo no Mi abilities.
keyMoments.significance: One of Moria's commanders fights to eliminate the Straw Hat intruders.

keyMoments.description: Kumashi, the commander-in-chief of Wild Zombies, is purified by Usopp.
keyMoments.significance: Major loss of a key military commander and Perona's strongest physical defender.

keyMoments.description: Perona's hidden room is discovered, exposing her critical weakness to the enemy.
keyMoments.significance: A devastating intelligence breach that compromises one of Moria's top commanders.
